item.title: Journey from Windows to Arch Linux
item.description: Windows, the most popular operating system, works well for the day-to-day activities but is of little help when it comes to programming and development. Inspired by seniors, I took my first step towards using Ubuntu, the most popular linux, as my host operating system about a year ago. It felt very uncomfortable at first to use this not-so-good-looking OS. But overtime, the simplicity and the ease of use overshadowed the unsightly UI.
